maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayacallbacks/livebeastinstance.cpp
/*

#include "mayacallbacks/livebeastinstance.h"
#include "liveasyncjob.h"
#include "beastutils.h"
#include "mayautils.h"

#include <maya/MFnDependencyNode.h>

namespace beastmaya {

void LiveBeastInstance::onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2) {
        MStatus res;
        MFnDependencyNode instanceNode(m_o, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        // Get Maya instance
        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> resultPair = getConnectedNode(instanceNode, L"instance");
        if(resultPair.first == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return;
        }
        MFnDependencyNode transformNode(resultPair.first, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
        MObject defaultEntityObj = getLiveEntityNode(transformNode);

        // Check if default/active entity has "Use instance properties" unchecked, early out if it is
        bool fromInstance = true;
        getPlugValue(defaultEntityObj, L"fromInstance", fromInstance);
        if(!fromInstance) {
                return;
        }

        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug1);

        if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                if (msg & MNodeMessage::kAttributeSet) {
                        if (plugName == L"textureResolution0" || plugName == L"textureResolution1" || plugName == L"texelScale" || plugName == L"autoTextureResolution") {
                                MFnDependencyNode depNode(m_o, &res);
                                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                                int2 textureResolution = {512, 512}; 
                                getLiveTextureResolution(transformNode, textureResolution);
                                m_targetEntity->setBakeResolution(textureResolution[0], textureResolution[1]);
                        }
                        if(plugName == L"liveTarget") {
                                LiveAsyncJobPtr liveJob = LiveAsyncJob::getInstance();
                                if(!liveJob) {
                                        return;
                                }

                                JobContext& bjc = liveJob->getJobContext();
                                auto it = bjc.getRenderGraph().entities.find(transformNode.object());
                                if(it == end(bjc.getRenderGraph().entities)) {
                                        return;
                                }

                                MObject liveTarget = getLiveBeastTarget(transformNode);
                                if(liveTarget == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                        return;
                                }

                                int targetType = 0;
                                getPlugValue(liveTarget, L"targetType", targetType);
                                ILBTargetEntityType tt = targetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE ? ILB_TT_TEXTURE : ILB_TT_VERTEX;
                                it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->changeTargetEntityType(tt);
                                if(targetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE) {
                                        int2 textureResolution = {512, 512};
                                        getLiveTextureResolution(transformNode, textureResolution);
                                        it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->setBakeResolution(textureResolution[0], textureResolution[1]);
                                }
                        }
                }
        }
}

LiveBeastInstance::LiveBeastInstance(const MObject& object, const BeastTargetEntityPtr& bte) :
NodeMessageObject(object), m_targetEntity(bte)
{
}

}
